activities:
Marketing related information for sales and marketing leads and prospects.  Data includes name, email address, company name, title, telephone number, work address, NetApp account number, historical data related to current and previous business relationship with NetApp.

Customer data required to support the customer relationship.  Data includes name, business title, company, email address, telephone number, work address
